title: Cannot start application on 3.26.0.CR1
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm working on upgrading https://github.com/cryostatio/cryostat to Quarkus 3.26 (in preparation for 3.27 LTS, which we hope to base our next release on).

I have just done `quarkus up -P 3.26.0.CR1` (starting from 3.25.2). Then I tried `mvn test` and I get failure output like this:

```
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  11.301 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2025-08-14T10:44:15-04:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-surefire-plugin:3.5.3:test (default-test) on project cryostat: 
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] See /home/work/workspace/cryostat/target/surefire-reports for the individual test results.
[ERROR] See dump files (if any exist) [date].dump, [date]-jvmRun[N].dump and [date].dumpstream.
[ERROR] There was an error in the forked process
[ERROR] TestEngine with ID 'junit-jupiter' encountered a critical issue during test discovery:
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] (1) [ERROR] ClassSelector [className = 'io.cryostat.ApiListingTest', classLoader = null] resolution failed
[ERROR]     Source: ClassSource [className = 'io.cryostat.ApiListingTest', filePosition = null]
[ERROR]             at io.cryostat.ApiListingTest.<no-method>(SourceFile:0)
```

Just guessing roughly from the stack trace, maybe this is related to #48687 since I see mention of `JfrProcessor`?

I'm not even sure where to begin with a reproducer for this.

### Expected behavior

Upgrading 3.25 -> 3.26 should not result in build failures.

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "21.0.8" 2025-07-15 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (Red_Hat-21.0.8.0.9-1) (build 21.0.8+9) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (Red_Hat-21.0.8.0.9-1) (build 21.0.8+9, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev
